targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
  SUM( total_errors)
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
  SUM( total_errors)
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;

WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('day', date_and_heure)::date AS jour, 
    SUM(total_errors)::float AS sum_errors
  FROM dataset
  -- Optionnel : si vous souhaitez tout de même limiter la période globale
  -- where date_and_heure >= now() - interval '30 days'
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  jour,
  -- On additionne sur les 6 jours précédents + le jour courant
  SUM(sum_errors) OVER (
    ORDER BY jour
    RANGE BETWEEN '6 days' PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  )
FROM daily
ORDER BY jour;

panels.title: Nb erreurs totales sur 7 jours glissants

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('day', time)::date AS jour, 
    SUM(total_errors)::float AS sum_errors
  FROM dataset
  -- Optionnel : si vous souhaitez tout de même limiter la période globale
  -- where date_and_heure >= now() - interval '30 days'
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  jour,
  -- On additionne sur les 6 jours précédents + le jour courant
  SUM(sum_errors) OVER (
    ORDER BY jour
    RANGE BETWEEN '6 days' PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  )
FROM daily
ORDER BY jour;

panels.title: Nb erreurs totales sur 7 jours glissants (échelle log10)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
   SUM(total_errors)/(SUM(total_errors)+SUM(nb_operations)) as "taux d'erreur"
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;

WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('day', time)::date AS jour, 
    SUM(total_errors)::float AS sum_errors,
    SUM(nb_operations)::float AS sum_ops,
    -- Taux quotidien pour chaque jour
    SUM(total_errors)::float / (SUM(total_errors)::float + SUM(nb_operations)::float) AS daily_ratio
  FROM dataset
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  jour,
  -- Moyenne des daily_ratio sur les 7 derniers jours (jour courant + les 6 jours précédents)
  AVG(daily_ratio) OVER (
    ORDER BY jour
    RANGE BETWEEN '6 days' PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS "taux d'erreur moyen 7j"
FROM daily
ORDER BY jour;

panels.title: Taux d'erreur quotidien MOYEN sur 7 jours glissants

targets.rawSql:
WITH daily AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('day', time)::date AS jour, 
    SUM(total_errors)::float AS sum_errors,
    SUM(nb_operations)::float AS sum_ops,
    -- Taux quotidien pour chaque jour
    SUM(total_errors)::float / (SUM(total_errors)::float + SUM(nb_operations)::float) AS daily_ratio
  FROM dataset
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  jour,
  -- Moyenne des daily_ratio sur les 7 derniers jours (jour courant + les 6 jours précédents)
  AVG(daily_ratio) OVER (
    ORDER BY jour
    RANGE BETWEEN '29 days' PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS "taux d'erreur moyen 30j"
FROM daily
ORDER BY jour;

panels.title: Taux d'erreur quotidien MOYEN sur 30 jours glissants

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUM(ColumnName_Error) AS total_Column_Name_Error,
  SUM(ConnectionTimeout_Error) AS total_ConnectionTimeout_Error,
  SUM(Create_TABLE_Error) AS total_Create_TABLE_Error,
  SUM(Date_Format_Error) AS total_Date_Format_Error,
  SUM(FieldSize_Error) AS total_Field_Size_Error,
  SUM(GuidezAtelier_Error) AS total_Guidez_Atelier_Error,
  SUM(Index_Error) AS total_Index_Error,
  SUM(Object_Reference_Error) AS total_Object_Reference_Error,
  SUM(Other_Error) AS total_Other_Error,
  SUM(PreLogin_Error) AS total_PreLogin_Error,
  SUM(Primary_Key_Error) AS total_Primary_Key_Error,
  SUM(SQL_Invalid_Query_Error) AS total_SQL_Invalid_Query_Error,
  SUM(SQL_Query_Timeout_Error) AS total_SQL_Query_Timeout_Error,
  SUM(Time_Format_Error) AS total_Time_Format_Error,
  SUM(Unique_Index_Error) AS total_Unique_Index_Error,
  SUM(Value_DIV0_Error) AS total_Value_DIV0_Error,
  SUM(Value_NAME_Error) AS total_Value_NAME_Error,
  SUM(Value_REF_Error) AS total_Value_REF_Error,
  SUM(Value_VALUE_Error) AS total_Value_VALUE_Error,
  SUM(Web_Service_Error) AS total_Web_Service_Error
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure);

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
  SUM(Column_Name_Error) as "Daily column Column_Name_Error",
  SUM(Connection_Timeout_Error) as "Daily Connection_Timeout_Error",
  SUM(Create_TABLE_Error) as "Daily Create_TABLE_Error",

  SUM(Date_Format_Error) as "Daily column Date_Format_Error",
  SUM(Field_Size_Error) as "Daily Field_Size_Error",
  SUM(Guidez_Atelier_Error) as "Daily Guidez_Atelier_Error",

  SUM(Index_Error) as "Daily column Index_Error",
  SUM(Object_Reference_Error) as "Daily Object_Reference_Error",
  SUM(Other_Error) as "Daily Other_Error",

  SUM(Pre_Login_Error) as "Daily column Pre_Login_Error",
  SUM(Primary_Key_Error) as "Daily Primary_Key_Error",
  SUM(SQL_Invalid_Query_Error) as "Daily SQL_Invalid_Query_Error",

  SUM(SQL_Query_Timeout_Error) as "Daily column SQL_Query_Timeout_Error",
  SUM(Time_Format_Error) as "Daily Time_Format_Error",
  SUM(Unique_Index_Error) as "Daily Unique_Index_Error",

  SUM(Value_DIV0_Error) as "Daily column Value_DIV0_Error",
  SUM(Value_NAME_Error) as "Daily Value_NAME_Error",
  SUM(Value_REF_Error) as "Daily Value_REF_Error",

  SUM(Value_VALUE_Error) as "Daily column Value_VALUE_Error",
  SUM(Web_Service_Error) as "Daily Web_Service_Error"

FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;

SELECT 
  SUM(ETL_Achats) AS total_ETL_Achats,
  SUM(ETL_BEXT) AS total_ETL_BEXT,
  SUM(ETL_Chargement_PJ) AS total_ETL_Chargement_PJ,
  SUM(ETL_GLPI) AS total_ETL_GLPI,
  SUM(ETL_Heures_Chauffeurs) AS total_ETL_Heures_Chauffeurs,
  SUM(ETL_JIRA) AS total_ETL_JIRA,
  SUM(ETL_KPI_ALDI) AS total_ETL_KPI_ALDI,
  SUM(ETL_Taxation) AS total_ETL_Taxation,
  SUM(ETL_Vue_Heures_Agregees) AS total_ETL_Vue_Heures_Agregees,
  SUM(ETL_sur_ordre) AS total_ETL_sur_ordre,
  SUM(ETL_API_JWT) AS total_ETL_API_JWT,
  SUM(Tous_les_jours) AS total_Tous_les_jours,
  SUM(Toutes_les_semaines_le_dimanche) AS total_Toutes_les_semaines_le_dimanche
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure);

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
  SUM(ETL_Achats) as "daily errors ETL_Achats",
  SUM(ETL_BEXT) as "daily errors ETL_BEXT",

  SUM(ETL_Chargement_PJ) as "daily errors ETL_Chargement_PJ",
  SUM(ETL_GLPI) as "daily errors ETL_GLPI",

  SUM(ETL_Heures_Chauffeurs) as "daily errors ETL_Heures_Chauffeurs",
  SUM(ETL_JIRA) as "daily errors ETL_JIRA",

  SUM(ETL_KPI_ALDI) as "daily errors ETL_KPI_ALDI",
  SUM(ETL_Taxation) as "daily errors ETL_Taxation",

  SUM(ETL_Vue_Heures_Agregees) as "daily errors ETL_Vue_Heures_Agregees",
  SUM(ETL_sur_ordre) as "daily errors ETL_sur_ordre",

  SUM(ETL_API_JWT) as "daily errors ETL_API_JWT",
  SUM(Tous_les_jours) as "daily errors Tous_les_jours",

  SUM(Toutes_les_semaines_le_dimanche) as "daily errors Toutes_les_semaines_le_dimanche"
  
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', date_and_heure::timestamp) AS jour,
  SUM(Connection_Timeout_Error + Create_TABLE_Error + Date_Format_Error + Field_Size_Error + Guidez_Atelier_Error + Index_Error + Object_Reference_Error + Other_Error + Pre_Login_Error + Primary_Key_Error + SQL_Invalid_Query_Error + SQL_Query_Timeout_Error + Time_Format_Error + Unique_Index_Error + Value_DIV0_Error + Value_NAME_Error + Value_REF_Error + Value_VALUE_Error + Web_Service_Error) AS total_erreurs
FROM dataset
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_and_heure)
GROUP BY jour
ORDER BY jour;
